Plan and establish work schedules, assignments, and production sequences to meet production goals.
Inspect materials, products, or equipment to detect defects or malfunctions.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Sanitation Technician

Location: Brooklyn Center, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Position: Sanitation Technician

Work Schedule

Monday to Friday: 4:00 PM - 12:30 AMSaturday: 10:00 AM - 6:30 PM (Mandatory Availability)

Join Our Team at Holiday/CK Stores, a Global Retail Powerhouse:

Why Choose Us?

At Holiday/CK Stores, we understand the importance of a comprehensive benefits package that supports not only your career but also your well-being and future.

Competitive Salary: Begin your journey with us at a competitive starting rate of $16/hour, complemented by the convenience of weekly pay.Referral Program: Expand our family and enrich yours by referring successful candidates. Earn $500 after their 90 days and another $500 at six months.Career Growth: With us, the sky's the limit. Embrace the plethora of opportunities available in both full-time and part-time capacities.Robust Benefits Package: Secure your future with our 401K matching, and stay healthy with our comprehensive medical and dental plans.Education Support: As you grow with us, we support your educational aspirations with tuition reimbursement programs.Employee Perks: Enjoy the little things - complimentary sandwiches and coffee during breaks, significant food and fuel discounts, and flexible hours to maintain that essential work-life balance.Professional Development: We’re invested in helping you shine, providing roles and support that let your talents thrive.Award-Winning Culture: Be a part of an award-winning team recognized for its exceptional workplace environment, teamwork, and customer focus.Sustainable Practices: Take pride in working for a company acknowledged for its commitment to environmental, social, and governance practices.

At Holiday/CK Stores, you're not just joining a team; you're joining a community where every member is valued, and every journey is made easier and more enjoyable - not just for our customers, but for each other.

Key Responsibilities

Maintain cleanliness and hygiene of the warehouse floors through sweeping, mopping, scrubbing, or vacuuming.Conduct routine sanitization of production equipment using specialized equipment and chemicals.Efficient waste management, separating recyclables and organic material.Operate and maintain cardboard balers and garbage receptacles.Clean and upkeep restrooms and break areas.Handle sanitizing chemicals safely and effectively.Report any equipment malfunctions to management.Adhere to safety, health, and quality standards, including OSHA, USDA or FDA guidelines, and internal procedures.

What We’re Looking For

Age 18 or older.Ability to follow verbal instructions, read labels and safety warnings.Self-motivated with the capacity to work autonomously.

Physical Demands

Regularly required to reach, stoop, bend, and move around during the shift.Push/pull and empty carts weighing up to 100 pounds.Continuous standing or walking throughout the shift.Ability to work in temperatures between 35-40°F.

Preferred Background

High School diploma, GED, or equivalent is a plus.Six months of sanitation experience in a food production setting is preferred.

Our Benefits Offering

Comprehensive insurance packages (Medical, Dental, Vision, Life, Disability).401k with company match and Employee Stock Option Program.Flexible Spending Accounts.Paid Vacation and Holidays.Exclusive company discounts on gas and merchandise.

Circle K is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

The Company complies with the Americans with Disabilities Act (the ADA) and all state and local disability laws. Applicants with disabilities may be entitled to a reasonable accommodation under the terms of the ADA and certain state or local laws as long as it does not impose an undue hardship on the Company. Please inform the Company’s Human Resources Representative if you need assistance completing any forms or to otherwise participate in the application process.

Click below to review information about our company's use of the federal E-Verify program to check work eligibility:
